Notes.Text:
This update for p7zip fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-47069: heap buffer overflow in `ZipIn.cpp` file (bsc#1209648).
- CVE-2025-53817: null pointer dereference may lead to denial of service (bsc#1246707).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: p7zip 16.02 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability via the function NArchive::NZip::CInArchive::FindCd(bool) at CPP/7zip/Archive/Zip/ZipIn.cpp.

Vulnerabilities.Description: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio. 7-Zip supports extracting from Compound Documents. Prior to version 25.0.0, a null pointer dereference in the Compound handler may lead to denial of service. Version 25.0.0 contains a fix cor the issue.
